mods.abstract: Runaway.--$100 Reward. TWENTY-FIVE Dollars reward will be given for the recovery of ISAAC, a mulatto, Blacksmith by trade, about 37 years of age, straight black hair, thin on the top of the head, has good clothing, and will endeavor to pass as white or as free. He left on a Creole Stud Pony, dun color, white face, and long tail. The above reward will be paid to have him secured in any jail in the State, so that we can get him, or for his delivery to us here; or One Hundred Dollars if taken out of the State. P. H. GARY & CO. Thibodaux, March 27, 1855.
